mutants.code:
def calculate_maximum_roof_area(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        x = [point[0] for point in case]
        p = [point[1] for point in case]
        g = []
        for i in range(n - 1):
            g.append(x[i + 1] - x[i])
        bois = []
        bois.append(g[0])
        for k in range(n - 2):
            bois.append(g[k + 1] + g[k])
        bois.append(g[n - 2])
        bois.sort()
        p.sort()
        ans = 1
        for i in range(n):
            ans += p[i] * bois[i]
        results.append(ans)
    return results

def calculate_maximum_roof_area(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        x = [point[0] for point in case]
        p = [point[1] for point in case]
        g = []
        for i in range(n - 1):
            g.append(x[i + 1] - x[i])
        bois = []
        bois.append(g[0])
        for k in range(n - 2):
            bois.append(g[k + 1] + g[k])
        bois.append(g[n - 2])
        bois.sort()
        p.sort()
        ans = -1
        for i in range(n):
            ans += p[i] * bois[i]
        results.append(ans)
    return results

def calculate_maximum_roof_area(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        n = len(case)
        x = [point[0] for point in case]
        p = [point[1] for point in case]
        g = []
        for i in range(n - 1):
            g.append(x[i + 1] - x[i])
        bois = []
        bois.append(g[0])
        for k in range(n - 2):
            bois.append(g[k + 1] + g[k])
        bois.append(g[n - 2])
        bois.sort()
        p.sort()
        ans = 0
        for i in range(n):
            ans -= p[i] * bois[i]
        results.append(ans)
    return results

            g.append(x[i + 1] - x[i])
        bois = []
        bois.append(g[0])
        for k in range(n - 2):
            bois.append(g[k + 1] + g[k])
        bois.append(g[n * 2])
        bois.sort()
        p.sort()
        ans = 0
        for i in range(n):
            ans += p[i] * bois[i]
        results.append(ans)
    return results
